    A

    adjointMatrix(double[][]) - Static method in class Main
    Calculates the adjoint of a given matrix.
    ArrayOperations() - Static method in class Main
    Provides functionalities for array operations, including: - Taking user input for array size and elements.

    C

    CaesarChip() - Static method in class Main
    Displays a menu for Caesar cipher encryption and decryption operations, allowing the user to choose either operation, specify a shift value, and enter a message to encrypt or decrypt.
    choicee(int) - Static method in class Main
    This method handles input validation, checking for valid integer inputs for both menu choices and shift values.
    clearConsole() - Static method in class Main
    Clears the console screen by printing ANSI escape sequences.

    D

    decision(String) - Static method in class Main
    Directs the program flow based on the user's menu choice.
    det(double[][]) - Static method in class Main
    Calculates the determinant of a given matrix.

    E

    elementwiseMatrixMultiplication() - Static method in class Main
    Performs element-wise multiplication of two matrices.
    encryption(int, String) - Static method in class Main
    Encrypts the given text using the Caesar cipher with a specified shift key.

    I

    initializeBoard() - Static method in class Main
    Initializes the game board with numbers 1 to 9.
    Inverse() - Static method in class Main
    Calculates the inverse of a matrix.

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
    Main method.
    Main - Class in Unnamed Package
     
    Main() - Constructor for class Main
     
    matrixCreate(int) - Static method in class Main
    Creates a matrix based on user-defined row and column sizes.
    MatrixMenu() - Static method in class Main
    Displays a menu for matrix operations, allowing the user to select from various matrix operations such as transposing, inverting, multiplying, or performing element-wise multiplication on matrices.
    MatrixMenuDecision(String) - Static method in class Main
    Handles the user's selection for matrix operations in the matrix menu.
    MatrixMultiplication() - Static method in class Main
    Multiplies two matrices.
    menu() - Static method in class Main
    Displays the main menu to the user, offering options for array statistics, matrix operations, text encryption/decryption, tic-tac-toe, and program termination.

    P

    printBoard() - Static method in class Main
    Prints the current state of the Tic Tac Toe board.

    S

    submatrix(double[][], int, int) - Static method in class Main
    Creates a submatrix by removing the specified row and column from the original matrix.

    T

    tictac() - Static method in class Main
    Starts the Tic Tac Toe game, handling player turns and game logic.
    transpose(double[][]) - Static method in class Main
    Transposes the given matrix.
